comments.en:
Printer takes RGB ink (!) which causes problems as most of the drivers are CMY drivers.

Artifacts occasionally occur in colour printing using the cdjcolor driver -- hpdj/pcl3 driver prints without artifacts, but in wrong (CMY) colour space.

Manufacturer resolution is claimed at 1440x1440, but I can only get 600x600 over via PCL3+.

Consumables/Refills: cartridge
